lead_paragraph: Ask athletes what goes into Olympic gold medals, and they will likely say sweat and years of training. For Brazil's National Mint the answer is simpler: recycled silver.

headline.main: Broken Mirrors to X-Ray Plates: Olympic Gold Not What It Seems
headline.print_headline: Broken Mirrors to X-Ray Plates: Olympic Gold Not What It Seems
